none: media/user/SCRAPE/terminal-escape-scrape/2023-08-fastbacks/extracted/Fastbacks/02 It Came TO Me In A Dream
media/user/SCRAPE/terminal-escape-scrape/2023-08-fastbacks/extracted/Fastbacks/06 What Will They All Say_ _ Says Who_

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 02, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Gonna hold onto this FASTBACKS energy as tight as I can today. They are dirty and determined, addictive and anthemic, punk...and full of promise. I think it was Mooneyham who first turned me onto them (might have been Todd though), back when this 1983 demo was a scant seven years old.  Pretty sure my introduction was The Answer Is You but it didn't matter because I quickly scooped up everything I could find and felt like every day was full of wild hooks and hope. I don't feel like that anymore, but there is hope in the shadows and sometimes getting hooked is just what needs to happen. So yeah, FASTBACKS energy all damn day. FASTBACKS
